author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0010 POM cleanup, remove unneeded repositories, remove/exclude
commons-cli 2.0
iThe main POM file contains references to snapshot repositories which
are not needed to build Oozie.
The core and example POM have references to commons-cli 2.0 that are
not needed.
The POMs of hadoop artifacts used by Oozie have references to
commons-cli 2.0 which are not needed and they should be excluded.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0004 Oozie console references the RowExpander.js file from an incorrect path.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0003 The XTestCase.getTestUser() method returns the hardcoded username test.
All test user group methods in the XTestCase class are paremeterized via
Java System Properties. The POM is also modified to propagate the MVN
invocation properties to the testcases (this is needed because testcases
run in forked JVM).
(Patch credits: ArvindP)
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: forcing creation of skeleton tree structure so that mighty maven doesn't lose its wits
